Text.Page:
If you're interested in helping out more, I have another favor. Before I leave, I want revenge on the tuwangis who chased me off.

There are so many of them, I'm sure they'd do nothing but chase me off again, but if you were to take care of the {@LinkCreature:5#9#Stonehammer Tuwangis}, I'm sure it would be just as satisfying.

Ha! I was rightâ€”it's just as satisfying, no matter who's doing the hammering!

Get it? Ha! Thank you, thank you, .
How are those tuwangis coming? Have they run away yet? Are they terrified?
